page.title: 07LEISURE IN RIPLEY.
page.content: We did a survey to find out what people liked to do in their leisure time.From our survey we discovered that there are many leisure time activities in Ripley.There is a big leisure centre near the middle of Ripley. There are two swimming pools,a sports hall where you can play badminton,football,basketball and on a Saturday rollerskate and 2 squash courts.In the six weeks holiday children go to the leisure centre and do super skills.You can also play snooker and pool in Ripley.There are lots of clubs in Ripley like tambourine class,a cricket club,a football club,a judo club,a karate club,a scrambling club and a tennis club.
